pages.text: Magmatic Turtles live in the nether. $(br2)They follow $(item)Crimson Roots$() and $(item)Warped Roots$(), you can breed them with those items too (remember that they put their eggs in Netherrack). $(br2)When they grow up, a single $(item)Magmatic Scute$() is dropped.
$(turtlemancy)Magmatic Turtles$() are not hostile, but they are always angry.
